items.text: There are several appraoches for this.
items.href: multithreading - Android: best practice to perform asynchronous operations in getView() - Stack Overflow

items.text: Although what you are doing is really not appropriate.
items.href: multithreading - Android: best practice to perform asynchronous operations in getView() - Stack Overflow

items.text: I have used Volley library here.
items.href: multithreading - Android: best practice to perform asynchronous operations in getView() - Stack Overflow

items.text: If you read the docs then you'll see that Volley runs on background threads.
items.href: multithreading - Android: best practice to perform asynchronous operations in getView() - Stack Overflow

items.text: So no need to implement your async tasks.
items.href: multithreading - Android: best practice to perform asynchronous operations in getView() - Stack Overflow
